name: Ravage (Centuplex)
description:
Welcome to the Ravage's World who was invaded by zombies. Without escape you will survive and fight against infinite hordes of Zombies.

THE STORY

In 2068 an epidemy created by Makhmud Kibrik (A scientist) infected the 91% of earth people. The scientist, feeling guilty, decided to form a team consisting of: war veterans, police officers and people who wanted to take back their planet. When the scientist sent the expedition unfortunately the group suffered a major loss: the zombies dismembered the most skilled person with weapons. The members of the group do not know that this boy sacrificed himself to make them escape because they believe that he killed himself. Probably if he didn’t sacrifice today I wouldn’t be writing this...

INSTALLATION [ONLY WINDOWS]
  • Download the zip file
  • Unzip
  • Open the Ravage.exe AS ADMIN [it download the full game]
  • When open Ravage it check if there are updates. Don't modify config.txt or it doesn't work
  • Have fun!
CONTROLS

WASD = Movement

E = Call the jet

Left Mouse Button = Shoot

GUNS [FOR THE BETA]
  • Glock [0 points]
  • Shootgun [250 points]
  • Smg [ >600 points]
